description:
A herbivore http://anidb.net/ch125776 [dragon] who wanted to live peacefully met a middle school sophomore girl http://anidb.net/ch125775 [Reko], who was seeking death. As he couldn`t persuade the suicidal Reko, he had to lie to her to ensure she goes on living. Now, believing the words of the "Evil Dragon", Reko starts her journey to fight against the Demon King`s army together with the most powerful "Evil Dragon".
Source: bilibili

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 齢5000年の草食ドラゴン、いわれなき邪竜認定

titles.title: Yowai 5000-nen no Soushoku Dragon, Iwarenaki Jaryuu Nintei Season 2
食草老龙被冠以恶龙之名 2
齢5000年の草食ドラゴン, いわれなき邪竜認定 season2
A Herbivorous Dragon of 5,000 Years Gets Unfairly Villainized 2
Shi Cao Lao Long Bei Guan Yi E Long Zhi Ming 2
